name: Beat The Loop
description:
Every loop new challenges.
Every loop new upgrades.
Every loop new opportunities.

Challenge yourself in this fast paced top-down racing game and race through growing, modular tracks while combining power-ups. Mix and match different combinations and grind the leaderboards.

Controls (keyboard)
Up Arrow: Boost
Left & Right Arrows: Rotate

Made during the 47th Ludum Dare game jam, inspired by Micro Machines & DataWing.
